title: Trading my T213-3 for your T213-2
author: buymycards

posts.post_title: Trading my T213-3 for your T213-2
posts.post_content:
Hi, I know the chances for a trade are slim, but I have a low grade T213-3 Myers that I would like to trade for 1 or more T213-2's.  I have been working on the Type 2 set and I currently have 63 cards from the Type 2 set and I am looking for more.

I am looking for low grade cards, graded or ungraded, even real beaters, that I can add to my Type 2 set.  

Thanks, Rick
